price: 2. Al-lah os ha prescrito cómo expiar los juramentos (que no vayáis a cumplir)[1055]. Al-lah es vuestro Protector y es el Omnisciente, el Sabio.
arabic: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes: [1055]  Ver la aleya 89 de la sura 5.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qad faraḍa al-lahu lakum taḥillata aymānikum wal-lahu mawlākum wahuwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
